page.title: 16Life Styles,New Galloway
page.content: The wide ranging life_styles in New Galloway are closely connected to the clubs described on page 9. Basically, though, the villagers tend to go for simpler forms of entertainment. We do have more cultural activities e.g.the DramaticSociety and Musical Appreciation Society.There are many Show Days for farming, flowers and poultry. These are well attended affairs. Evening entertainment tends to centreround the hotelswhere darts and pool are played.The majority do football coupons but there are no Bookmakers.Many youngsters tend to go away to college/universities,only returning for vacations.Those youngsters who stay at home are fashionable and aware of pop culture, obviously due to their access to media.In general, a peaceful tolerance reigns between the young and old.
